name: Longevity & Cellular Health
mechanism: Epitalon activates telomerase and supports telomere health. Pinealon provides neuroprotection and circadian optimization. Thymulin addresses immune senescence and T-cell function
cycling: Bioregulators (Epitalon, Pinealon) use cyclic protocols. Thymulin can be more continuous
synergy_notes: Addresses multiple hallmarks of aging: telomere attrition (Epitalon), immune senescence (Thymulin), and neurodegeneration (Pinealon)
considerations: Best evidence for longevity from this stack
Epitalon has direct telomerase activation data
Effects are long-term, not immediately apparent
